document.full_text: more than 1,000 protesters ignored an army order to leave cairo's main square on sunday, extending into a third day their calls for a quick move to civilian rule and a deeper purge of corrupt officials.
document.title: more than 1,000 defy egypt army order to quit square
lines_and_colors: more than 1,000 protesters ignored an army order to leave cairo's main square on sunday, extending into a third day their calls for a quick move to civilian rule and a deeper purge of corrupt officials.
